short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show the number of tokens in the current prompt for ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension shows the number of tokens in the current prompt for ChatGPT. 

Maximize your ChatGPT experience with real-time token tracking. The Token Counter for ChatGPT extension effortlessly integrates with your ChatGPT interface, providing live updates on token usage as you type. Ideal for writers, researchers, and AI enthusiasts, this tool ensures you stay within the model's token limits for efficient and effective communication. Get clearer insights into your prompt's length and complexity. Install now for a smarter, more informed ChatGPT interaction.

This extension does not collect or send any data, ensuring your interactions remain private and secure.
